plot: The movie continues the story from the TV series which ended with a cliff hanger where the wife was deciding whether to return to her cheating husband or have a relationship with her boss.
title: Xi li ren qi: Zui zhong hui - Xing fu nan bu nan
plot_es: The movie continues the story from the TV series which ended with a cliff hanger where the wife was deciding whether to return to her cheating husband or have a relationship with her boss.
